flash.pattern: Select more strums for {{changes, number}} chord changes in a bar

flash.max: Choose not more than six chords

1.title: Chords
1.text:
Choose atleast two chords

If you are a beginner, start with A, D or E

2.title: BPM and Chord Changes
2.text:
BPM varies from 30 to 240

If you are a beginner, start with 30/60 BPM and 1 chord change

3.title: Strumming Pattern
3.text: Choose atleast 2 strums for 1 chord change, an up or down from a set, an up or down from another
